## Summary

Configure essential repository files for a Node.js/TypeScript monorepo. The current `.gitignore` is only 8 bytes and `.gitattributes` only excludes `.idea/`. These need comprehensive patterns to prevent accidental commits of build artifacts, secrets, IDE files, and OS noise.

**References:** DD-14 Section 34.5, MILESTONES.md Cross-Cutting Security M0â†’All

## Requirements

### `.gitignore` (comprehensive Node.js monorepo patterns)
```gitignore
# Dependencies
node_modules/
.pnpm-store/

# Build outputs
dist/
build/
.svelte-kit/
.turbo/

# Environment files (never commit secrets)
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Testing
coverage/
.nyc_output/
test-results/
playwright-report/

# IDE
.vscode/*
!.vscode/settings.json
!.vscode/extensions.json
!.vscode/launch.json
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Database
*.sql.bak
pgdata/

# Logs
*.log
logs/

# TypeScript
*.tsbuildinfo
```

### `.gitattributes` (line ending normalization + binary handling)
```gitattributes
# Auto-detect text files and normalize line endings
* text=auto

# Force LF line endings for all text files
*.ts text eol=lf
*.tsx text eol=lf
*.js text eol=lf
*.json text eol=lf
*.md text eol=lf
*.css text eol=lf
*.html text eol=lf
*.svelte text eol=lf
*.yaml text eol=lf
*.yml text eol=lf
*.sh text eol=lf

# Binary files
*.png binary
*.jpg binary
*.gif binary
*.ico binary
*.woff binary
*.woff2 binary

# Export ignore
.idea/ export-ignore
.vscode/ export-ignore
```

### `LICENSE`
- Add appropriate license file (recommendation: proprietary with Matrices GmbH copyright, or discuss with team)
- Include copyright year and entity: "Copyright 2025-2026 Matrices GmbH"

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `.gitignore` covers all Node.js, TypeScript, SvelteKit, IDE, OS, and environment patterns
- [ ] `.gitattributes` enforces LF line endings for all text files
- [ ] Binary files marked correctly in `.gitattributes`
- [ ] `LICENSE` file present with correct copyright entity
- [ ] `.vscode/settings.json`, `extensions.json`, `launch.json` are NOT ignored (allowlisted)
- [ ] No build artifacts, `node_modules`, or `.env` files can be accidentally committed

## Dependencies
- Depends on: None (can start immediately)
- Blocks: All other M0 issues (prevents dirty commits)
title: M0-19: Repository configuration (.gitignore, .gitattributes, LICENSE)
